name: Performapal Ladyange
text:
[ Monster Effect ]
You can discard this card and 1 "Performapal" monster, except "Performapal Ladyange"; draw 2 cards.
If this card is in your GY and you control an "Odd-Eyes" card or "Performapal Gentrude": You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
You can only use 1 "Performapal Ladyange" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
pendulum_text:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, when an attack is declared involving your monster and an opponent's monster: You can discard 1 Pendulum Monster; that opponent's monster loses 1000 ATK, until the end of this turn.
